div.p: – – – [...] Thermûtharion [– – – Tûr]bôn, den Griechen [...]imos und Thermû[– – – des N.N.], (des Sohnes ?) des Tûrbôn [...] im selbem Viertel [...] Apia, 10 Jahre (alt), [...] Tûrbon, [...] die Sklaven der [...]lla, 36 Jahre (alt), und Tau[– – – registriert] unter den Nachgeborenen [...]os, Sklave, [...] – – –

– – – [...] Thermoutharion [– – – Tour]bon, Hellene [...]imos and Thermou[– – –, son of NN], (the son ?) of Tourbon [...] in the same quarter [...] Apia, 10 years old, [...] Tourbon, [...] slaves of [...]lla, 36 years old, and Tau[– – – registered] in the list of those born since [...]os, slave [...]
